key.name: allow-running-in-background
key.description: Whether the application should run in the background when the window is closed

key.name: hide-secret-service-warning
key.description: Do not show any warning when the secret service health check fails on startup

key.name: window-height
key.description: Stores the last used window height to restore on next startup

key.name: window-width
key.description: Stores the last used window width to restore on next startup

key.name: allow-preview-images
key.description: Whether the application will load the images for media cards

key.name: allow-poster-images
key.description: Whether the application will load poster images for libraries and details pages

key.name: allow-shortcuts-images
key.description: Whether the application will load the images for shortcuts

key.name: allow-tracklist-images
key.description: Whether the application will load the cover for each track in a tracklist

key.name: cache-images
key.description: Whether the application will temporarily cache images on the filesystem

key.name: cache-libraries
key.description: Whether the application will cache library content locally

key.name: cache-metadata
key.description: Whether the application will cache metadata locally

key.name: max-router-history-size
key.description: The maximum number of router history entries to keep

key.name: enable-watchlist
key.description: Whether the Watchlist tab should be shown in the navigation bar
